nodes.text: Star Wars: Attack of the Clones: The Illustrated Companion

Star Wars: Attack of the Clones: The Illustrated Companion is a book written by Marcus Hearn to accompany the film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. The book includes details about the film's plot, characters and the actors who played them, as well as giving a behind-the-scenes perspective on the making of the film.

Jam packed with illustrations and photographs alongside the insightful words of Star Wars aficionado Marcus Hearne, the book enlightens us on all aspects of the film including how they made the film; the actors; the characters; locations; the art; and the costumes. 'Connections Boxes' highlight and explain the many fascinating links between Episode II and the previous Star Wars movies. Using informed, enthusiastic writing and illustrations from Episode II and the earlier films, this is the first Star Wars book of its kind and the perfect companion to the film.
